name: Married filing jointly - Low income
description: Married couple earning $50,000 combined annually in Texas (no state tax)

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 IRS tax brackets (Rev. Proc. 2025-32) and FICA rates
sources.notes: Standard deduction: $32,200. Taxable income: $17,800. Tax: 10%*$17,800=$1,780. SS: $50,000*6.2%=$3,100. Medicare: $50,000*1.45%=$725. No additional Medicare (under $250k for MFJ). Total deductions: $5,605. Net: $44,395.
